name: Regretful Ghosts
description:
My submission for the Ritual (bitsy jam).

Controls - Arrow keys / UpDownLeftRight / Walk into things to win

I'm not super experienced or anything so I just wanted to make something fun and a bit comical.

You play as a ghost whose friend is bored of being dead and asks you to find 3 mages who can complete a ritual that will bring the both of you back to life! Such a riveting story I know. It's even more exciting in-game woww
